Body: Possible Duplicate:  Reinstalling purchased apps on a new phone?  I've just tweaked my Google Play application to believe I have an HTC Desire S so I can buy all the games that I can't buy with my Acer Liquid Metal.No problem with that...Then I saw that all my old purchased software was not purchased.Now two solutions are there:I just made an happy mess --> no problem.If you buy any app for your phone and then buy a new one you should buy that app... AGAIN?!?!
Title: If I buy a software and change smartphone, should I buy it... AGAIN?

history.Text: I've just tweaked my Google Play application to believe I have an HTC Desire S so I can buy all the games that I can't buy with my Acer Liquid Metal.No problem with that...Then I saw that all my old purchased software was not purchased.Now two solutions are there: 1. I just made an happy mess --> no problem. 2. If you buy any app for your phone and then buy a new one you should buy that app... AGAIN?!?!
If I buy a software and change smartphone, should I buy it... AGAIN?

I just made an happy mess --> no problem. 2. If you buy any app for your phone and then buy a new one you should buy that app... AGAIN?!?!
